table.name: monUOW

messages.SQL0551N: Security issue. Please install "Monitoring Switches/Security" in Tools -> Installed Components

table.description: You can use this view to monitor units of work. The view retrieves information using a monitor table function introduced in DB2 9.7. Each row displays metrics for a single unit of work returned by the MON_GET_UNIT_OF_WORK table function. This view is not available for database prior to DB2 9.7.

column.name: uowElapseTime
column.sqlName: case when UOW_START_TIME <= current timestamp - 30 minutes then double(TIMESTAMPDIFF(2,CHAR(current timestamp - UOW_START_TIME))) else double(TIMESTAMPDIFF(1,CHAR(current timestamp - UOW_START_TIME)))/1000 end
column.title: UOW Elapse
